bd3c099b-e267-4b7a-b156-4676435afe68.description: This professional learning series will strengthen social workers’ cultural awareness and the benefit of embedding culturally responsive evidence-based practices and interventions. This is an integral step in helping students and families overcome social-emotional and mental health difficulties, such as trauma, racism, and assimilation, and challenging inequitable systems of access, power, and privilege.
bd3c099b-e267-4b7a-b156-4676435afe68.name: Culturally Responsive School Social Work Practice and Interventions

issuer.summary: issued by NYC DOE Institute of Social Work Continuing Education (ISWCE)

badge_template_activities.title: Culturally Responsive School Social Work Practice and Interventions Cohort A- 6 Continued Education (CE) Credits
